content: {"name": "City Harvest Mobile Market - The Melrose Mobile Markets", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.cityharvest.org/programs/mobile-markets/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "286 East 156th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10451", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.822018, "longitude": -73.920303}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 412-0740", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Eligible if you are a resident of Melrose, Morrisania Air Rights and Andrew Jackson Houses or Referred patients Boricua Community Health Center or a resident in zip code 10451"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Recommended to arrive before 10am; people begin lining up at 7am"}]}
